original_text: the priest is to examine them, and if the disease has covered their whole body, he shall pronounce them clean. Since it has all turned white, they are clean.
korean_text: 그가 진찰할 것이요 나병이 과연 그의 전신에 퍼졌으면 그 환자를 정하다 할지니 다 희어진 자인즉 정하거니와

sentences.original_text: the priest is to examine them
and if the disease has covered their whole body
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 만약 질병이 그들의 온몸을 덮었다면

sentences.original_text: Since it has all turned white
